page.title: 16An Adult's Day
page.content:
{Mrs Barrett}has her breakfast at about {8 o'clock.}She has{muesli}and a cup of tea, with her family . After breakfast, she makes her son's sandwiches for school. At 8.45 am. Mrs Barrett takes her son, Philip,to school, then return home to wash the dishes.{At 9.15 am}she works at {playschool,}which has{30 children}each day.
At lunch time{Mrs Barrett}has a sandwich and a cup of coffee, and helps in the school library during the {afternoon.}After school, she collects her son from guitar club , and then takes him to cubs. She watches the ten o'clock news and reads the {newspaper}before going to bed. Mrs Barrett enjoys playing{badminton}and {gardening}in her{allotmont.}
